tooltip.weapon.more_damage: §6Deals more damage to fire immune mobs
tooltip.tool.bonus_efficiency: §6This tool breaks blocks faster in the Nether
tooltip.armor.damage_reduction: §6Reduces damage from hot sources. Every piece protects on it's own. In the Nether the damage reduction is more effective.
tooltip.flint_and_vulcanite.set_on_fire: §6Use on a mob to set it on fire
tooltip.vulcanite_block.set_on_fire: §6Sets mobs standing on it on fire!
advancements.vulcanite.root.title: Vulcanite Mod
advancements.vulcanite.vulcanite_ingot.d: Smelt Nether Vulcanite Ore to get a Vulcanite Ingot
advancements.vulcanite.vulcanite_upgrade: Use an Anvil, Iron Equipment and Vulcanite Nuggets to create Vulcanite Equipment
advancements.vulcanite.sword.title: Fire-Immunes Slayer
advancements.vulcanite.sword.description: Get a Vulcanite Sword and smash those fire immunes
advancements.vulcanite.tools.title: Smelting on the go
advancements.vulcanite.tools.description: Get every tool made of Vulcanite. The hotness of the Nether makes them faster
advancements.vulcanite.flint_and_vulcani: Obtain a Flint and Vulcanite. You can directly "cook" mobs with a right-click
advancements.vulcanite.armor.title: Anti-Hotness
advancements.vulcanite.armor.description: Obtain a full set of Vulcanite Armor. This will keep Lava away.
advancements.vulcanite.block.title: From alive to on fire
advancements.vulcanite.block.description: Obtain a Vulcanite Block and (don't) stand on top of it
